definition: palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale
to withdraw/to pull back/to contract/to shrink/to reduce/abbreviation/also pr. [su4]

sentences.chinese: 突然之間宮縮猛烈起來了。

sentences.english: Inefficient uterine action should be corrected before attributing dystocia to a pelvic problem.
sentences.chinese: 在骨盆問題引起的難產前，無效的宮縮應該加以糾正。

sentences.english: Let the contractions speak for themselves, as loudly as they need to.
sentences.chinese: 讓宮縮用他們所需要的音量，爲自己說話吧。

sentences.english: Uterine atony with obstetric bleeding was the primary cause of obstetric hysterectomy.
sentences.chinese: 宮縮乏力導致的產科出血是子宮切除的首要原因。

sentences.english: Tell her it only hurts during the contractions.
sentences.chinese: 告訴她只是在宮縮的時候纔會痛。

sentences.english: The other, a pressure-sensitive gauge, measures the intensity and duration of uterine contractions.
sentences.chinese: 另一個是壓力感應器，測量宮縮強度和持續時間。

sentences.english: And at the same time I started to feel regular contraction.
sentences.chinese: 而這時我的宮縮也開始變得有規律了。

sentences.english: Your doctor may tell you to call right away if you have any contractions .
sentences.chinese: 醫生可能囑咐發生任何宮縮時都要立即給醫生打電話。

sentences.english: What kind of contractions is "false" and won't attack array shrinkage and childbirth?
sentences.chinese: 什麼樣的宮縮是“假陣縮”而不會發作而分娩呢？

sentences.english: I woke my husband and we settled in to time the contractions.
sentences.chinese: 我把丈夫叫醒，平靜下來來測定宮縮的時間。

sentences.english: When you do, be clear and specific about the frequency, duration, and strength of your contractions.
sentences.chinese: 清晰的描述宮縮的頻率，持續時間和強度。

sentences.english: In many cases, the gel is enough to get contractions and labor started.
sentences.chinese: 在許多情況下，凝膠的量足夠讓宮縮開始。

sentences.english: Your baby will be squeezed, compressed, pushed, and molded with every contraction.
sentences.chinese: 在每一次宮縮時，他將被擠，壓，推。

definition: to form a scar/to form a scab
yellow face, emaciated body (idiom); malnourished and sickly in appearance
in high spirits (idiom); glowing with health and vigor
to feel sick/to feel nauseous/to feel disgusted
